item.title: Leetcode 30 Substring with Concatenation of All Words 解题报告
item.description: Leetcode 30 Substring with Concatenation of All Words 解题报告 题目 (Problem) You are given a string, s, and a list of words, words, that are all of the same length. Find all starting indices of substring(s) in s that is a concatenation of each word in words exactly once and without any intervening characters. Example 1: Input: s = "barfoothefoobarman", words = ["foo","bar"] Output: [0,9] Explanation:
